Riding.name: Basic Riding
Riding.description: Can ride any horses and other basic mounts.

Riding.name: Improved Control
Riding.description: Mounts move 10% faster and are easier to control.

Riding.name: Sturdy Mount
Riding.description: Mounts gain 20% more health and are harder to knock off.

Riding.name: Swift Gallop
Riding.description: Mounts can sprint for short durations, increasing speed by 30%.

Riding.name: Combat Riding
Riding.description: Can use melee weapons while riding without penalty.

Riding.name: Mounted Archery
Riding.description: Can use ranged weapons while riding without penalty.

Riding.name: Loyal Companion
Riding.description: Mounts will not flee in combat and gain a 15% damage resistance.

Riding.name: Charge Attack
Riding.description: Can perform a mounted charge attack, dealing extra damage to enemies.

Riding.name: Elite Mount
Riding.description: Unlocks access to rare and powerful mounts (e.g., warhorses, magical beasts).

Riding.name: Master Rider
Riding.description: Mounts gain 50% more speed, health, and damage resistance.
